data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of The Dangs.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of The Dangs, Gujarat, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in The Dangs, Gujarat, India so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.section_summary: On average, 48 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in The Dangs, Gujarat, India.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, help the 2,511 believers find a person of peace today among the 225,789 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of The Dangs, Gujarat, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Shenva (Muslim traditions) people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Shenva (Muslim traditions) people.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of The Dangs, Gujarat, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 2,511 believers in The Dangs.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of The Dangs to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

location.name: The Dangs
location.people_groups_list: Vasava, Valmiki, Balmiki (Hindu traditions), Shemalia, Kasbati (Muslim traditions), Lohana
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Vasava (600), Valmiki, Balmiki (Hindu traditions) (5,248,000), Shemalia (2,800), Kasbati (Muslim traditions) (10,000), Lohana (580,000)
